text: tum kah do ki mai to apane paravaradigaar kee taraph se ek raushan daleel par hoon aur tumane use jhuthala diya (to) tum jis kee jaldee karate ho (azaab) vah kuchh mere paas (ekhtiyaar mein) to hai nahin hukoomat to bas zarur khuda hee ke lie hai vah to (haq) bayaan karata hai aur vah tamaam phaisala karane vaalon se behatar hai
